gate.uima.mapping
Interface ObjectBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
GateAnnotationBuilder, GateAnnotFeatureValueBuilder, GateDocumentFeatureValueBuilder, StringBuilder, UIMAAnnotationBuilder, UIMAFeatureStructureBuilder, UIMAFSFeatureValueBuilder
public interface ObjectBuilder

Basic interface for an object that creates other objects based on information from an XML configuration file.

Method Summary
 Object buildObject(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS cas, Document doc, AnnotationSet annSet, Annotation currentAnn, org.apache.uima.cas.FeatureStructure currentFS)
          Build an object.
 void configure(org.jdom.Element elt, org.apache.uima.cas.TypeSystem typeSystem)
          Configure this ObjectBuilder from the given XML element.
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(org.jdom.Element elt,
               org.apache.uima.cas.TypeSystem typeSystem)
               throws MappingException
Configure this ObjectBuilder from the given XML element. The UIMA type system is also provided to allow the builder to acquire references to any UIMA Type and Feature objects it will need later.

Throws:
MappingException

buildObject

Object buildObject(org.apache.uima.cas.CAS cas,
                   Document doc,
                   AnnotationSet annSet,
                   Annotation currentAnn,
                   org.apache.uima.cas.FeatureStructure currentFS)
                   throws MappingException
Build an object. The current UIMA and GATE document/annotation set and annotation objects are provided, as the precise objects to be created may depend on the current context.

Throws:
MappingException
